description.paragraph1: I'm a Full Stack Developer, with more focus on Front End, using technologies such as Angular, Angular Elements, Spring Boot, Apache Camel, Unit Testing and languages like TypeScript and Java.
description.paragraph2: I've been working with some technologies such as JavaScript, HTML, CSS, SASS, Kotlin, Git, Gitlab, React, React Native, Python, Next.js, SQL among others.
description.paragraph3: Located in São Paulo - Brazil, I'm constantly learning and improving my knowledge of new technologies, creating small personal projects, with a good command of good programming practices and design patterns and always looking for innovations and challenges as well.
